mapper.sql: USER_OID, USER_NAME, USER_ALIAS, GENDER, PHONE, EMAIL, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PWD, USER_TYPE_OID
mapper.update:
UPDATE USER_PROFILE
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
USER_ALIAS = #{userAlias,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_ID = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_PWD = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE_OID = #{userTypeOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHERE USER_OID = #{userOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE USER_PROFILE SET USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, USER_ALIAS = #{userAlias,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_ID = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PWD = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE_OID = #{userTypeOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE USER_OID = #{userOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
